name: Super Luigi Sunshine
overview: Luigi makes his debut on the Nintendo GameCube with Super Luigi Sunshine. On a vacation away from the Mushroom Kingdom, Luigi finds himself in a messy situation on the island of Delphino, where a Luigi look alike has been causing all kinds of trouble. Explore huge 3D environments that range from a lush waterfall paradise, to an exciting amusement park complete with a rollercoaster you can ride. Luigi makes use of a new water pack, which allows him to hover, launch, and rocket around levels, as well as spray enemies with. Luigi has never had so many cool new moves, or looked so good in 3D.
